articles.description: Thomas Partey - the Atletico Madrid midfielder - has emerged as one of Arsenal's top transfer targets ahead of the summer window.
articles.content:
Partey is available for €50million (£44.2m) due to a release clause in his contract, which is due to expire in 2023.
Atletico are eager to rewrite the terms of the Ghana international's deal in order to raise the value of the aforementioned option but could … [+486 chars]

articles.title: Ex-Real Madrid striker arrested and questioned over cocaine trafficking ring - Mirror Online
articles.description: Edwin Congo was on Real Madrid's books for three years after becoming the most expensive Colombian footballer when he signed for the club, but has now been forced to protest his innocence
articles.content:
Former Real Madrid player Edwin Congo has been questioned by police in relation to a cocaine trafficking ring in Spain. 
The retired Colombian striker was taken in by officers in Madrid on Tuesday before undergoing an hours interrogation.
He was allowed to … [+1986 chars]
